name: Roc-hole
description:
Roc - Hole

Hi, I am the developer of roc - hole. The game doesn't have much it just about surviving the black - hole that appear on your screen by not entering in it, the game is current finest but may have some bugs or glitches, so if you found any bugs or glitches please comment down bellow and I will try to fix it and the game is on early state, so it may have a some changes in future update thank for reading.
